suggestions.name: Warm Berry Yogurt Compote
suggestions.description: A warm, comforting snack featuring gently sautéed berries served over creamy yogurt with a touch of cinnamon.
instructions: In a small saucepan, gently sauté berries over medium-low heat for 2-3 minutes until they begin to release juices
Add cinnamon, vanilla extract, and lemon zest, stirring gently
Cook for another minute until fragrant
Place yogurt in a bowl and top with the warm berry mixture
Serve immediately while the berries are still warm

suggestions.name: Steamed Berry Yogurt Rice Cake
suggestions.description: A unique Asian-inspired steamed rice cake with a yogurt and berry topping, offering a satisfying blend of textures.
instructions: Mix rice flour with 60ml water to form a smooth batter
Add maple syrup and almond extract to the batter
Pour into two small heatproof dishes
Mix yogurt with half of the berries, crushing them slightly
Top the steamed rice cakes with the yogurt mixture

suggestions.name: Mediterranean Boiled Barley with Berry Yogurt Swirl
suggestions.description: A hearty Mediterranean-inspired grain bowl featuring boiled barley topped with a creamy yogurt and berry swirl, finished with a touch of olive oil and honey.
instructions: Rinse barley thoroughly under cold water
Boil barley in 180ml water for about 25 minutes until tender (can be prepared ahead and reheated)
While barley is cooking, mash half the berries and mix with yogurt
Drain cooked barley and place in a serving bowl
Drizzle with olive oil and a touch of honey
Garnish with remaining whole berries and fresh mint leaves
